value:
$WmMPID_リベラ,ch04_29_Riviera_F_Normal,Face|Are you certain, Sumia?! Unknown
forces have set fire to a village and
are marching to this tower next?!$k$p$WmMPID_スミア,ch04_27_Smia_F_Normal,Face|Yes! I can see it clearly from atop my
pegasus. They're heading this way
now!$k$p$WmMPID_オリヴィエ2,ch04_03_Olivie_F_Normal2,Face|Oh no... We're about to face another
battle, aren't we?$k$p$WmMPID_マリアベル,ch04_28_Mariabell_F_Normal,Face|Judging by the direction they're
heading... Do you suppose their goal
is the village near this tower?$k$pI shall not allow them to do as they
please within the borders of Ylisse.
We must intercept them at once.$k$p$WmMPID_スミア,ch04_27_Smia_F_Normal,Face|But their numbers are far greater
than ours. If we face them head-on...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|You'll be just fine... Because we're
here to lend a hand!$k$p$WmMPID_オリヴィエ2,ch04_03_Olivie_F_Normal2,Face|Huh? Who are you?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|We are the Order of Heroes, of Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Like the enemies who march this
way, we come from... Well, we're
from another world. It's a long story.$k$p$WmMPID_リベラ,ch04_29_Riviera_F_Normal,Face|If you're here to help, it matters not
where you're from. We thank you for
your aid.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Just leave it to us. Our numbers may
be few, but we pack a punch! Not to
mention our legendary Summoner.$k$pYou can count on us!$k$p$WmMPID_リベラ,ch04_29_Riviera_F_Normal,Face|I sent a request for reinforcements to
Lord Chrom back in the capital.$k$pWith our current strength, I'm afraid
Sumia is correct... If we attack
head-on, we'll be crushed.$k$pTherefore, we must focus our efforts
on evacuating the villagers.$k$pWe must buy as much time as
possible while we wait for
reinforcements.$k$p$WmMPID_マリアベル,ch04_28_Mariabell_F_Normal,Face|I agree. Furthermore, I am certain we
will be able to buy the time required.$k$p$WmMPID_オリヴィエ2,ch04_03_Olivie_F_Normal2,Face|If it will help protect the people of
this village, then I'll... I'll do what I
can!$k$p
